title: guestStay
description: A guestStay object represents a past, current, or upcoming stay by a guest or guests at a property. It contains information about the location, duration and other details of the stay, as well as profile information about the guests and other associated entities.

action.description: Action that triggered the guest-stay message

property.description: Property code that the stay belongs to

guaranteeCode.description: Code representing the type of guarantee for the stay

lastUpdatedAt.description: Time at which the stay was last updated

lastUpdatedBy.description: Name, username, or initials of the user or system that last updated the stay

bookingNumber.description: ID assigned to the stay by the booking engine or central reservation system

bookingDate.description: Time at which the stay was booked

bookedBy.description: Name, username, or initials of the user or system that booked the stay

reservationSource.description: Channel by which the stay was booked

cancellationNumber.description: ID assigned to the cancellation of the stay

cancellationDate.description: Time at which the stay was canceled

canceledBy.description: Name, username, or initials of the user or system that canceled the stay

checkinDate.description: Scheduled check-in date of the stay

actualCheckinDate.description: Actual check-in time of the stay

checkedInBy.description: Name, username, or initials of the user or system that checked the guest in

checkoutDate.description: Scheduled check-out date of the stay

actualCheckoutDate.description: Actual check-out time of the stay

checkedOutBy.description: Name, username, or initials of the user or system that checked the guest out

numberOfAdults.description: Number of adults in the stay

numberOfChildren.description: Number of children in the stay

roomType.description: Actual room type of the stay, preferably in code/short form

roomTypeChargeCode.description: Room type charged to the stay

numberOfRooms.description: Number of rooms of the stay

market.description: Market segment name or code of the stay

travelAgency.description: Travel agency associated with the stay

totalRoomRevenue.description: Room revenue amount of the stay

totalFoodAndBeverageRevenue.description: Food and beverage revenue amount of the stay

totalLuggageRevenue.description: Luggage revenue amount of the stay

totalOtherRevenue.description: Total of all revenue amounts excluding room, food, beverage, and luggage, of the stay

totalDepositRequired.description: Deposit amount required for the stay

depositRequiredDate.description: Date on which deposit is due

ratePlans.description: Rate plans attached to the stay

profiles.description: Profiles associated with the stay. A minimum of 1 profile with profileType GUEST is required.

stayLength.description: A description of the length of stay
Number of days of the stay

stayLengthUnits.description: Type of the time units of the stay length

rate.description: A rate during a specific time period

timeUnits.description: Number of time units of the rate

rateCode.description: Rate plan name or rate code

timeSpan.description: Time period over which the rate plan applies

confidential.description: Whether the rate plan should be hidden from guests

rates.description: Breakdown of the rates under the rate plan

service.description: A service rendered during a stay

rateCode.description: Rate plan name or rate code of the service

timeSpan.description: Time period over which the service was rendered

pricePerUnit.description: Price per unit of the service

numberOfUnits.description: Number of units of the service
